name: wp-multi-network
description: A Network Management Interface for global administrators in WordPress Multisite installations

scripts.build: wp-scripts build && npm run copy-source && npm run rename-assets && npm run generate-rtl-source
scripts.copy-source: grep -v "import .*css" src/js/index.js | grep -v "// Import styles" > wp-multi-network/assets/js/wp-multi-network.js && cp src/css/style.css wp-multi-network/assets/css/wp-multi-network.css
